website_summaries.verdict: Trail fanatics are in for a great treat with the Euro Rock Hiker from Timberland. Indeed, this incredibly hike-worthy boot is bound to wow its owners with stellar comfort, outstanding fit (both in width and length), and jaw-dropping aesthetics. That said, purchasers might want to check out this Timberland offering at a brick-and-mortar store to get a better appreciation of its actual physical design. Nevertheless, the Euro Rock Hiker is a phenomenal product whose excellence bridges style and utility so effortlessly.
pros: The extreme level of comfort of the men’s Timberland Euro Rock Hiker has deeply impressed almost everyone who reviewed it
According to a multitude of users, this boot-type hiking footgear from Timberland runs true to size
Its handsome looks stump numerous trail lovers
This remarkable leather hiking boot was commended for its just-right width
Many wearers are so stunned by the Euro Rock Hiker’s overall workmanship that they swear to buy it again and again
The shoe is considered an excellent piece of investment by a few patrons
An owner is quite bespectacled by the shoe’s virtually non-existent break period
cons: The Timberland Euro Rock Hiker hiking boot is criticized by a customer for not looking like the shoe shown in photos from online retailers

customer_reviews.title: Shocking
customer_reviews.text: Great service from the seller But the shoes... Did I really pay nearly 3 figures for some shoes that seem to be made from tissue paper They are replacing an older pair of the same shoes Shocked at the poor quality they feel like cheap and nasty footwear not a premium trusted brand So disappointed Cannot tell you too much about wearing them as I’m trying not to!
customer_reviews.author: Boy from Brum

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, dubious build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Boots felt great except for the fact that the top eyelet broke while trying them on the first time, so I had to send them back! I have quite a high in-step and this was catered for with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Latham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed,  not genuine
customer_reviews.text: they were delivered promptly and as well packaged as you'd expect a pair of boots to be, but upon opening I was very disappointed, they looked a bit like the picture at first but the more I looked the more disappointed I got , not only were they broken but they were obviously not genuine Timberland boots, the logo looked off, the quality of the stitching was slapdash and parts were sewn together wonky, hence they were sent back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sequined turtle

customer_reviews.title: Superb comfy stylish boot
customer_reviews.text: Super boot , I am aware that Timberland come slightly big , I ordered normal size as I will wear them for winter with thick socks , incredibly comfy, a lot better in my opinion than Rockports

product_meta.title: Timberland Men's Euro Rock Hiker Chukka Boots
product_meta.description: Timberland Euro Rock Hiker made from high-quality ecologically tanned leather for durability and comfort. Mesh inner lining made from 100% recycled PET made from plastic bottles for breathability and climate control inside the shoe. Removable insole and lightweight EVA footbed for optimum cushioning and comfort all day long. Environmentally friendly Green RubberTM rubber outsole with 42% recycled content for grip safety on any surface.
